## ğŸ“± How to Add to Calendar

### Google Calendar

1. Open Google Calendar: https://calendar.google.com
2. Click "+ Create" or "+" button
3. Set event details:
   - **Event Name**: "VSCode Quarterly Maintenance - Farmers Market"
   - **Date**: January 21, 2026
   - **Time**: 9:00 AM - 12:00 PM
   - **Repeat**: Custom â†’ Every 3 months on the 21st
4. Add description: Copy from "Event Description" above
5. Set reminders:
   - 1 week before at 9:00 AM
   - 3 days before at 9:00 AM
   - 1 day before at 9:00 AM
   - Day of at 9:00 AM
6. Save event

### Microsoft Outlook

1. Open Outlook Calendar
2. Click "New Event" or "New Appointment"
3. Set event details:
   - **Subject**: "VSCode Quarterly Maintenance - Farmers Market"
   - **Start**: January 21, 2026, 9:00 AM
   - **End**: January 21, 2026, 12:00 PM
   - **Recurrence**: Quarterly (every 3 months)
4. Add description: Copy from "Event Description" above
5. Set reminders:
   - Add 4 reminders (1 week, 3 days, 1 day, morning of)
6. Save event

### Apple Calendar

1. Open Calendar app
2. Click "+" or "New Event"
3. Set event details:
   - **Title**: "VSCode Quarterly Maintenance - Farmers Market"
   - **Date**: January 21, 2026
   - **Time**: 9:00 AM - 12:00 PM
   - **Repeat**: Custom â†’ Every 3 months
4. Add notes: Copy from "Event Description" above
5. Set alerts:
   - 1 week before
   - 3 days before
   - 1 day before
   - Day of event at 9:00 AM
6. Save event

### Windows Calendar

1. Open Calendar app (built-in)
2. Click "New Event"
3. Fill in details:
   - **Name**: "VSCode Quarterly Maintenance - Farmers Market"
   - **Start**: January 21, 2026, 9:00 AM
   - **Duration**: 3 hours
   - **Repeat**: Every 3 months
4. Add description: Copy from "Event Description" above
5. Set reminders (add multiple)
6. Save
